name: Algal growth
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Moderate growth matches local light regime, unless historically high/low (e.g., blackwater).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate percent algal cover or use chlorophyll or periphyton data where available and interpret with nutrients and shade context.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Minimal algae and no nuisance mats.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Large mats that partially impair habitat.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Dense bloom or scum that covers substrate.

references: EPA Water Quality Portal (chlorophyll-a, periphyton where available)
